game.name: Tight And Bright Party
game.description:
Wow! The two beautiful girls named Princy and Vincy have received the invitation for the tight and bright party tonight. They look pretty excited and are looking forward to wear jaw-dropping looks. These beauties have come to you after hearing a lot about your impressive fashion sense. Would you like to give your helping hands when they need you the most? Join Tight And Bright Party and be prepared to create the complete party looks for these two pretties! Browse their huge outfit collection in this brand new girls game!
Do not need to shy while mixing and matching dresses and accessories until you create the fabulous result. Again play the role of a professional fashion designer to make them look stunning for the party in this HTML5 dressing game. Start with Princy first by dressing her up with a pink color outfit with a green ribbon on the waist and pair it with a cool hairstyle, a pair of matching sandals, jewelry and nice pink sunglass! Do not forget to give her hair a multicolor hair band to complete her look.
Hurry up friends! Vincy is also waiting for her turn so move fast to create a lovely party look for her. She would look fabulous in a red midi short dress and combine it with some curly hairs, a pair of red sandals, a tiara with red flowers, matching jewelry and a pair of red sunglass. You can also choose a red t-shirt with pink overcoat and a white short with some flower prints. Combine her look with other needful matching accessories to make them look fashionable!
